alternativeNames: Reboul, Germain-Eugene-Hyacinthe; de Reboul, Eugène; de Reboul, Eugenio
notes: TL-2 (4: 614. 1983) shows 1781 as the birth year
source: obituary by Antonio Targioni Tozzetti in Cont. Atti Imp. Reale Accad. Econ.-Agrar. Georgof. Firenze 29: 484-493. 1851(from David Hollombe; and Lotte Burkhardt)
